Thank you, Prof.Goodwin.
  I did not have the script in python examples before,
  It can be found from cantera-1.7.0.tar.tar
   
  Crystal
  Dave Goodwin <dgoodwin@...> wrote:
          In the Python examples, there is a script "surf_pfr.py" that should do what you want.

--- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, "crystl_jin" <crystl_jin@...> wrote:
>
> Hello,everyone,
> I am new to cantera,python and matlab. I try to implement surface 
> chemistry in a plug flow reactor, but the surface chemistry is not 
> implented ( I create a cti. file with all the reaction and datas,and it 
> can be read by the cantera.) The reaction time is much longer than 
> expected. 
> 
> Can someone tell me how to implement the surface chemistry? Do you have 
> any example of the PFR model? 
> 
> Thank you 
> 
> Crystal
>
